name: Pleasant Valley - New Beginnings
description:
PLEASANT VALLEY Is a Farming Game made for LD52! The goal of the game is to tend to the farm left to you by your family member. Harvest crops, upgrade your tools, and unlock other areas of the map!
  • MOVE:                     WASD
  • JUMP:                       SPACE
  • INTERACT:               F
  • USE TOOL:               Left Mouse Button
  • SWITCH SEEDS:      Tab
  • SWITCH TOOLS:      Scroll Wheel
  • Fixed lots of bugs from the JAM version, see list below
  • Game economy and prices have been all adjusted to provide a better gameplay curve.
  • MAC version now available
  • Not clicking on the text box in the game at the start may put you into a softlock, please press the escape key to regain mouse control and try again
  • There is a bug that causes the UI for getting hurt to stay, if you get hurt again it goes away - Update 1 fixes this
  • Scythe weapon is treated as a gun instead of a melee weapon - Update 1 fixes this
  • Seed bag when used on enemies instant kills them - Update 1 fixes this
  • A softlock can occur in the jam release when spending the initial cash you are given on stuff other than seeds - Update 1 fixes this
